subject: Hockey, Ice
Writing and Writers
Books and Literature
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: The hockey world lost two of its most respected communicators last week: John Halligan, a hockey historian, and Paul Quarrington, an award-winning Canadian novelist.
snippet: The hockey world lost two of its most respected communicators last week: John Halligan, a hockey historian, and Paul Quarrington, an award-winning Canadian novelist.
